author: James Joyce
text: Dear Miss Weaver Thanks for the current number of The Egoist and also for your defence of my text. I am afraid I am obliged to trouble you once more. Will you please send a copy of The Egoist (issue: 15 January 1914), containing Mr Poundâ€™s article A Curious History to Mr A. Llewelyn Roberts, 40 Denison House, 296 Vauxhall Bridge Road, London, S.W.? With many thanks in advance and kind regards Sincerely yours James Joyce
